mil3.3.8:1.2: “bhante nagasena, yattha manovinnanam uppajjati, phassopi vedanapi tattha uppajjati”ti?
mil3.3.8:1.3: “Ama, maharaja, yattha manovinnanam uppajjati, phassopi tattha uppajjati, vedanapi tattha uppajjati, sannapi tattha uppajjati, cetanapi tattha uppajjati, vitakkopi tattha uppajjati, vicaropi tattha uppajjati, sabbepi phassappamukha dhamma tattha uppajjanti”ti.
mil3.3.8:3.2: “Yatha, maharaja, dve menda yujjheyyum, tesu yatha eko mendo, evam cakkhu datthabbam.
mil3.3.8:3.3: Yatha dutiyo mendo, evam rupam datthabbam.
mil3.3.8:3.4: Yatha tesam sannipato, evam phasso datthabbo”ti.
mil3.3.8:4.2: “Yatha, maharaja, dve pani vajjeyyum, tesu yatha eko pani, evam cakkhu datthabbam.
mil3.3.8:4.3: Yatha dutiyo pani, evam rupam datthabbam.
mil3.3.8:4.4: Yatha tesam sannipato, evam phasso datthabbo”ti.
mil3.3.8:5.2: “Yatha, maharaja, dve samma vajjeyyum, tesu yatha eko sammo, evam cakkhu datthabbam.
mil3.3.8:5.3: Yatha dutiyo sammo, evam rupam datthabbam.
mil3.3.8:5.4: Yatha tesam sannipato, evam phasso datthabbo”ti.
